text: Nocardioides aquaticus is a strictly aerobic, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides which has been isolated from tidal flat sediments in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides aestuarii at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase aestuarii Category:Bacteria described in 2004
title: Nocardioides aestuarii
